home.about-description: I help business grow by crafting amazing software solutions. If you're looking for a developer that likes to get stuff done

profile.profile-description-01: My name is Franklin, I'm a software developer, passionate about the art of code.
profile.profile-description-02: I am proficient in HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Bootstrap. These skills allow me to create visually appealing and responsive user interfaces that enhance the overall user experience.
profile.profile-description-03: I'm oriented towards generating solutions through communication, innovation, and technological invention. Committed to human development through ethical technological progress.

skills.skills-sub-title: I am striving to never stop learning and improving

projects.projects-sub-title: I had the pleasure of working on these awesome projects
projects.project-01-description: Video game developed using Java as part of the Programming Patterns Course at Cenfotec University.
projects.project-02-description: Commerce platform crafted with cutting-edge technologies, including MySQL, AWS, Angular, TypeScript, and NodeJS.
projects.project-03-description: Web platform of the Costa Rican Taekwondo Federation for tournament management, built with technologies such as: React, Javascript, C#, ASP.NET MVC and Microsoft SQL Server.

contact.contact-sub-title: I'm always open to new opportunities
